text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Toledo |official_name = |other_name = |native_name = |native_name_lang = |settlement_type = City |total_type = |nickname = La ciudad Imperial (The Imperial City) |image_skyline = Toledo Skyline Panorama, Spain - Dec 2006.jpg |image_alt = |image_caption = Toledo at sunrise — The Alcázar on the left and Cathedral on the right dominate the skyline |image_flag = Bandera de Toledo.svg |flag_alt = |image_shield = Escudo de la Ciudad de Toledo.png |shield_alt = |image_map = |mapsize = |map_alt = |map_caption = |pushpin_map =Spain |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_map_alt = |pushpin_map_caption = |pushpin_mapsize = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = Spain |subdivision_type1 = Autonomous Community |subdivision_name1 = Castile–La Mancha |subdivision_type2 = Province |subdivision_name2 = Toledo |subdivision_type3 = Comarca |subdivision_name3 = Toledo |subdivision_type4 = Partido judicial |subdivision_name4 = Toledo |seat_type = |seat = |parts_type = |parts_style= |parts = |p1 = |p2 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_party = PSOE |leader_title = Mayor |leader_name = Emiliano García-Page Sánchez |established_title = Settled |established_date = Pre-Roman |established_title1 = |established_date1 = |founder = |named_for = |area_footnotes = |area_land_km2 = 232.1 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_max_footnotes= |elevation_min_footnotes= |elevation_m = 529 |elevation_max_m = |elevation_min_m = |population_as_of = 2012 |population_footnotes = INE |population_note = |population_total = 84,019 |population_density_km2 = auto |timezone1 = |utc_offset1 = |timezone1_DST = |utc_offset1_DST = |coordinates= |postal_code_type = Postcode |postal_code = 45001-45009 |area_code_type = |area_code = +34 |website = http://www.ayto- toledo.org/ |footnotes = }} Toledo is a city in Spain with a population of 85,000. It is a historical city with a lot of monuments. The city was important from the Roman period to the 18th century. It is the capital of the autonomous community of Castile-La Mancha and the Toledo province. Many famous people and artists were born or lived in this city, including Garcilaso de la Vega, Alfonso X and El Greco. A city in Ohio was named after this. ==Sinagoga del Tránsito== File:Sinagoga del Tránsito interior2.jpg| File:Sinagoga del Tránsito interior3.jpg| File:Toledo - Sinagoga El Transito 01.jpg| File:RoyLindmanElTransito 005.jpg| File:RoyLindmanElTransito 009.jpg| File:RoyLindmanElTransitoSynagogue 003.jpg| File:A Black and White Photograph taken in the Synagogue of El Transito - Toledo Spain.jpeg| File:A Black and White Photograph inside the Synagogue of El Transito - Toledo Spain.jpeg| File:A Black and White Photo taken in the Synagogue of El Transito - Toledo Spain.jpeg| File:RoyLindmanElTransitoSynagogue 005.jpg| File:Yeseria de la galeria.jpg File:Toledo street.jpg ===Notes=== ==Further reading== * ==Other websites== *Municipality *Exhibit on Toledo, Ohio Sister City Agreement * Photography of Toledo by Antony Marsh * http://lahistoriadefermosa.com "La Historia de Fermosa" Abraham S. Marrache, Hebraica Ediciones 2009, a historical novel in Spanish about the love affair in 1179 between King Alfonso VIII of Castile and the young Toledan Jewess, Fermosa. *Sunset in Toledo , Eretz Acheret Magazine *Legends of Toledo * Free Audio Guide of Toledo ES/EN *Spain's official website - Info about Toledo Category:Capital cities in Spain Category:World Heritage Sites in Spain
title: Toledo, Spain
